name: Karina
skills: Animal Handling +7, Insight +9, Perception +9, Persuasion +9, Stealth +8, Survival +9

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: When in owl form, the karina does not provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The karina’s spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The karina can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: chill touch, dancing lights * 3/day each: faerie fire, fog cloud * 1/day: moonbeam

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.desc: Karina have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks based on sight or hearing.

traits.name: Owl Form
traits.desc: As a bonus action when under moonlight, a Karina can transform either into or from owl form. In owl form, the karina gains fly 60 ft. and natural attacks (see below).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: A karina makes two dagger attacks or one bite and one talon attack.

actions.name: Bite (Owl Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger (Human Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing or slashing damage.

actions.name: Talons (Owl Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.
